dct_title_s: Ins. Ceilan quae incolis Tenarisin dicitur
dct_alternative_sm: Insula Ceilan quae incolis Tenarisin dicitur
dct_description_sm: Ceilan hujus insulae descriptionem a Cypriano Sanchez cosmographo Hispano delineatam, huic nostro operi inserendam, dedit Clarissimus vir Petrus Plancius.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Leucae Hispanicae" and "Milliaria Germanica."
North oriented toward left of sheet.
Decorative cartouches, compass roses, rhumb lines, ships.
Features topography, waterways, vegetation, fauna vignettes (e.g., elephant).
Appears in Jansson's Nouveau theatre du monde ou nouvel atlas, Amsterdam: Hondius, 1639.
